title: OASIS Business Document Naming and Design Rules (BDNDR) Unqualified Types
description:
This is an expression of OASIS Unqualified Data Types as a JSON schema
following the OASIS Business Document Naming and Design Rules Version 1.1.

Version: $Date: 2020/04/09 15:00:15 $UTC

AmountType.title: Amount. Type
AmountType.description: A number of monetary units specified using a given unit of currency.

BinaryObjectType.title: Binary Object. Type
BinaryObjectType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.

GraphicType.title: Graphic. Type
GraphicType.description: A diagram, graph, mathematical curve, or similar representation.

PictureType.title: Picture. Type
PictureType.description: A diagram, graph, mathematical curve, or similar representation.

CodeType.title: Code. Type
CodeType.description: A character string (letters, figures, or symbols) that for brevity and/or language independence may be used to represent or replace a definitive value or text of an attribute, together with relevant supplementary information.

DateTimeType.title: Date Time. Type
DateTimeType.description: A particular point in the progression of time, together with relevant supplementary information.

DateType.title: Date. Type
DateType.description: One calendar day according the Gregorian calendar.

TimeType.title: Time. Type
TimeType.description: An instance of time that occurs every day.

IdentifierType.title: Identifier. Type
IdentifierType.description: A character string to identify and uniquely distinguish one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme, together with relevant supplementary information.

IndicatorType.title: Indicator. Type
IndicatorType.description: A list of two mutually exclusive Boolean values that express the only possible states of a property.

MeasureType.title: Measure. Type
MeasureType.description: A numeric value determined by measuring an object using a specified unit of measure.

NumericType.title: Numeric. Type
NumericType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

ValueType.title: Value. Type
ValueType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

PercentType.title: Percent. Type
PercentType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing and is expressed as a percentage. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

RateType.title: Rate. Type
RateType.description: A numeric expression of a rate that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.

QuantityType.title: Quantity. Type
QuantityType.description: A counted number of non-monetary units, possibly including a fractional part.

TextType.title: Text. Type
TextType.description: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters), generally in the form of words of a language.

NameType.title: Name. Type
NameType.description: A character string that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept.
